name: Droned Out
description:
Feedback Form! https://forms.gle/KLtpZTTEZ631LBXB8

This difficult, relatively short platformer, sees you playing as the worlds deadliest cleaning robot, destroying the rouge drones in the factory. This is the first game I've released so I highly recommend you fill out the feedback form so I can improve my skills. Feel free to make a lets play of this, though I doubt that will actually happen.
